text:
Many things should be able to generate warnings, such as
empty filesets and other things where the Task to be performed doesn't make sense.

In general with Ant so far, I want more control over build messages than I am being provided.  Some level should show
every task executed with its attributes, and tasks should have a standard for reporting something when they don't do anything (probably as a warning).
